body: What are compromised accounts? I see people banned for compromised accounts.
body_tagged: What are compromised accounts? I see people banned for compromised accounts.
title: Compromised accounts

replies.body: Keyloggers, people purposely trying to crack accounts with easy passwords, those are compromised accounts.
replies.body_tagged: Keyloggers, people purposely trying to crack accounts with easy passwords, those are compromised accounts.

replies.body:
Accounts that have been hacked, basically.

Like those "FREE OPTIFINE CAPE" websites. Basically, they steal your account.
replies.body_tagged:
Accounts that have been hacked, basically.

Like those "FREE OPTIFINE CAPE" websites. Basically, they steal your account.

replies.body:
They are just accounts whose real owner request staff to ban it as he hasn't got the control of them for the time being, he can of course ask for it to be unbanned if he recovers it.

Just to avoid other people doing/saying something the real owner wouldn't want to, as hacking or insulting.
replies.body_tagged:
They are just accounts whose real owner request staff to ban it as he hasn't got the control of them for the time being, he can of course ask for it to be unbanned if he recovers it.

Just to avoid other people doing/saying something the real owner wouldn't want to, as hacking or insulting.

replies.body:
Can I get banned for making a free optifine cape website, if I only keylog non-avicus-members?
Basically yes as long nobody from the Avicus network clicks the link?

I want to be sure so I ask you

It is breaking the law, though.
